item.title: The Stealthy Rolls Royce Wraith Overdose Pumps Out 717 HP
item.description:
The Stealthy Rolls Royce Wraith Overdose Pumps Out 717 HP

For some, the stock version of Rolls-Royce's Wraith is enough luxury and power to satiate. However, there are always those outliers that try to push the envelope on style and strength. Call them overachievers, dreamers, or spotlight seekers. Whatever they may be, sometimes such a zealous attitude delivers something beautiful.

item.title: Dubai's Futuristic Floating Seahorse Home Boasts Underwater Bedrooms
item.description:
Dubai's Futuristic Floating Seahorse Home Boasts Underwater Bedrooms

Waterfront property has always been valuable, enough so that a bunch of engineers and builders in Dubai decided to push the limits and build a floating home. Just recently, the same group that put out the original version of this home onto the water have circled back with a Signature Edition of the Floating Seahorse - combing the comforts of a luxury home with the perks of being on a yacht.

item.title: Pre-Order SeeNote Today
item.description:
Pre-Order SeeNote Today

SeeNote is the always on, digital sticky note. See important updates and controls from your favorite apps. Never miss what matters.

item.title: Stock Up | Harry's new SPF15 Lip Balm
item.description:
Stock Up | Harry's new SPF15 Lip Balm

Summer is coming, keep those lips in check. If you're like us, you've probably lost a small fortune of lip balms in your life. It's never good enough to buy just one as each stick tends to vanish from your pocket on a regular basis.

item.title: Instead Of Renting An Apartment, Sign A Lease That Lets You Live Around The World
item.description:
Instead Of Renting An Apartment, Sign A Lease That Lets You Live Around The World

If you can afford the airfare, it's getting easier to be a digital nomad. Roam, a new network of co-living spaces, offers a lease that lets you continually move: After a couple of weeks or months in Madrid, you can head to Miami, or Ubud, Bali.

item.title: Invisible Fingerprint Sensors Will Help Save Smartphone Design
item.description:
Invisible Fingerprint Sensors Will Help Save Smartphone Design

A few years ago, smartphones began sprouting odd, circular growths. Sometimes these growths would appear on the front, other times on the back, but they pretty uniformly conquered high-end handsets with all the speed and subtlety of a virus. These are fingerprint sensors, and as much as they've increased smartphone security, they've been a pain on smartphone design.

item.title: Nike Innovates Again With the RZN Tour Golf Ball | Man of Many
item.description:
Nike Innovates Again With the RZN Tour Golf Ball | Man of Many

It's almost golf season in many parts of the world, as the weather is turning and the summer is approaching. While your game almost certainly hasn't improved over the winter, there's no reason why your gear and accessories shouldn't. Nike has just recently released an impressive new golf ball which combines engineering feats with experience in design to produce an [...]

item.title: Kendrick Lamar's Life Story (In Lyrics)
item.description:
Kendrick Lamar's Life Story (In Lyrics)

From Cornrow Kenny to K. Dot, Kendrick Lamar has given us his life story through his raps. To prove it, we combed through years of the Compton spitter's rhymes - from early mixtape days to his latest critically acclaimed material - piecing together his life story using only his lyrics.

item.title: Real Salt Lake: Aaron Maund now an indispensable starter along RSL back line
item.description:
Real Salt Lake: Aaron Maund now an indispensable starter along RSL back line

"Had to switch it out," he said, no doubt in his mind he would need that jersey on the pitch. "No Vick's today." Maund walks through the double-doors to the player's tunnel, his cleats clicking and clacking against the concrete.

item.title: Drake Opens Up on 'Views,' Kanye, and Nicki In New Interview With Zane Lowe
item.description:
Drake Opens Up on 'Views,' Kanye, and Nicki In New Interview With Zane Lowe

Drake's new album Views is out now, and alongside the release he sat down with Zane Lowe for a long and very in-depth chat. Sitting in 40's studio in Toronto, Drake broke down his new album, his close relationship with Kanye West, how things are between him and Nicki, and much more.
